name: Legor 7 - Best Free Puzzle Logic And Brain Game
name_original: Legor 7 - Best Free Puzzle Logic And Brain Game
description:
Popular award winning puzzle logic brain game Legor is back with 30 new levels of increasing difficulty! This time you will play with 9 new shapes! The rules are still the same - place all the shapes on the table to the empty slots as fast as possible! Your score depends on your speed! Submit your score at the end of the game to a global leaderboard to see who is the fastest in solving Legor puzzles! The game is 100% free and does not contain any In-App purchases

How to play: Move the shapes with your finger and try to put them all to the empty spaces on the board. Your score depends on your speed.

Features:

* 30 levels of increasing difficulty
* Great game to improve logic thinking - not only for kids
* global leaderboard included - compare your score with other people all around the world
* 100% free with no In-App purchases
* Great fun for the whole family

Enjoy and have a nice time playing our puzzle game Legor 7! Also don't forget to check out more Legor games in our profile!

If you find any bug, please let us know at littlebigplay@gmail.com, we will be very happy to fix it!

Support links:
